casebody.data:
Rodney Hall, Dante Branham, Ehramis Chism, Tyriuq Gordon, M.M.(minor) by his Guardian Ad Litem, Benika Rayford, Benika Rayford, Individually, and Erik Staley
v.
Michael L. Greene and Mount Zion Christian Academy No. 96P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Christopher Walker, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Hall, Rodney, et al. Pamela S. Duffy, Attorney at Law, Burlington, for Greene, Michael L. Brenda S. McClearn, Attorney at Law, Peter F. O'Connell, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Mount Zion Christian Academy

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 18th of March 2016 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
